_description: Custom detection rules for Cross Guard. Users can extend the built-in feature detection by adding rules here.
_instructions: Each rule maps a pattern to a Can I Use feature ID. Patterns are regular expressions.

css._example_comment: Example: detect a custom CSS property

javascript._example_comment: Example: detect a new JS API

elements._example_comment: Map element names to Can I Use feature IDs

attributes._example_comment: Map attribute names to Can I Use feature IDs

input_types._example_comment: Map input type values to Can I Use feature IDs

attribute_values._example_comment: Map (attribute, value) pairs to Can I Use feature IDs. Format: 'attribute:value'
